description: 20% discount on fuel purchases during January.
terms: Applicable for a minimum purchase of Rp150,000. Not valid with other promotions.

description: Get a Rp10,000 cashback for every fuel purchase in February.
terms: One code per transaction. Cashback will be credited to your account within 7 days.

description: Bonus 5 liters for every 50 liters of fuel purchased.
terms: Only valid for premium fuel purchases. Show code at the time of transaction.

description: 15% discount for loyal customers in April.
terms: Code valid only for registered customers. Minimum purchase of Rp200,000.

description: Rp5,000 discount for every purchase made using the app.
terms: Code valid only for transactions made through the app. Minimum purchase of Rp100,000.
